root.title: Azure Subscription Permission Elevation Via AuditLogs
root.description: Detects when a user has been elevated to manage all Azure Subscriptions. This change should be investigated immediately if it isn't planned. This setting could allow an attacker access to Azure subscriptions in your environment.
root.author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
